name: W00t Raiders
description:
Jam Entry for the Mix and Game Jam 2020 -> https://itch.io/jam/mix-and-game-jam-2020)

Gather your local mates and compete in this turn-based Card RPG! Who can kill the most monsters and earn the most treasure out of the dungeon crawl?

"W00t Raiders" created by Benjamin Gneist, Jonas Rainero and Fabian Schroth

Programming:
Benjamin Gneist
Fabian Schroth

Art:
Jonas Rainero

Additional Assets taken from the following Asset Packs:

"2D Hand Painted - Dungeon Tileset" created by Daniel Thomas

"Monsters Time Fantasy RPG Sprite Pack" created by finalbossblues

"Wooden UI" created by REXARD

"Yellow Card Template" created by REXARD

"Item Cards" created by REXARD

"Fantasy Cards Pack" created by REXARD

"Battle RPG Music Pack" created by wowsoundsg

"Medieval Fantasy SFX Pack" created by EvilMind
